ValidationRule.description: Security value must be positive if Security Type in (Bank Guarantee, Security Lodged Deposit) otherwise Security Value must be negative.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( (Security_Value__c < 0), OR( ISPICKVAL( Type__c , 'Bank Guarantee'), ISPICKVAL( Type__c , 'Security Lodged Deposit') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please correct security value. It should be positive amount. (e.g. +100)
